articles.title: Nashville Regional Preview: Vanderbilt preparing for postseason march • D1Baseball - D1 Baseball College Baseball News & Scores
articles.description: SEC champ Vanderbilt welcomes Pac-12 champ Oregon, Big East champ Xavier and OVC champ Eastern Illinois to Nashville.
articles.content: PostseasonPatrick Ebert - May 31, 2023A unique regional in which all four teams won their respective conference tournaments, and the corresponding automatic bid, Vanderbilt is still the clear-cut tea… [+357 chars]
